name: Tableland
challengeTitle: Dynamic & Private NFT Metadata with Tableland + Lit Protocol
challengeDesc: We are looking for projects that make full use of the Tableland features to build the metadata layer in their projects.
benefitIntro: Our team has plans to integrate the newly released decentralized NFT metadata layer from Tableland, allowing our users to easlily protect ALL of their NFT data.
benefit1: Our beautiful NEW native mobile UI/UX will make it easy to Create & Manage Private NFT Metadata from anywhere at anytime.
benefit2: We'll allow consumers to Safely Store Sensitive Data On-chain for access by content owners & fulfillment managers ONLY.
benefit3: Encourage greater on-chain private data usage throughout the Web3 community.
benefitClose: We will continue to research & explore new and better ways of integrating with Tableland.
